description.narrative:
The project strengthening local to global influencing falls under Oxfam Novib#s Strategic Partnership with the Dutch government andmore specifically the Theory of Change for Finance for Development, aiming to achieve impact for more citizens to enjoy their basicrights and financial inclusion and experience equal opportunity in more democratic societies.
In Finance for Development, Oxfam Novib and SOMO aim to achieve that more women, youth and other citizens benefit from higher quality and quantity of finance for development, an enhanced fiscal system and a sustainable and inclusive financial and corporate sector, tackling extreme inequality. To achieve the long-term outcome of the project, we use the following strategies: capacity building of civilsociety organizations, strengthening national and international coalitions, increase public pressure on governments and multinational corporations, increased media coverage, and increased political will.
This project aims to support national and regional initiatives in the South, linking our national work to the global level campaigns and building our global influencing network. The following activities have been identified:
Implementation of the Fair Tax Monitor (FTM).in Vietnam. FTM is a unique evidence-based tool that identifies the main bottlenecks within tax systems and provides strong evidence for advocacy work at national and international level. This tool is already partof the country office proposals in Uganda, Pakistan and OPTI. With thisfunding the tool can be developed in four additional countries during the second and third year of the SP.

participating-org.narrative: Viet Nam Institute for Economic and Policy Research (VEPR), formerly known as Viet Nam Center for Economic and Policy Research , isa research institute under the University of Economics and Business, Vietnam National University. VEPR considers its primary mission is to carry out economic and policy research which helps policy-making agencies, businesses and interest groups make better desision by providing insights into the nature of the economic movement and the macro policy management in Viet Nam. VEPR works with otherAgriculture Coalition's members, such as Institute for Studies of Society, Economics and Environment (iSEE), Southern Centre for Agriculture Policy (SCAP). Oxfam partly funds and supports in technical aspect for Agriculture Coalition. VEPR represents AgricultureCoalition to receive fund and register with relating authorities.
